text: Sir Roderick David Stewart, (born 10 January 1945) is a British pop singer, known professionally as Rod Stewart. He was born in London to an English mother and Scottish father. When he started singing in the 1960s, he was player for Brentford F.C., a football team. He started singing in local R&B; groups, in the 1970s he began a solo career which made him very famous. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:English rock singers Category:English singer-songwriters Category:Living people Category:Singers from London Category:People from Highgate Category:Warner Bros. Records artists
title: Rod Stewart
